title: I honestly think they need to buff Zyra
body:
Even if its just a little, she is just so slow, 
and cant really take any hits. i mean, either make 
her a little faster or give her some power. Like i said, 
even if its just a little bit, she needs it.

replies.body: I disagree, she is very slow but she has great range and requires a lot more kiting to play effectively. She already does a tremendous amount of damage if you build her glass cannon.

imo she functions just like lux, a halfway between utility based and damage based. She definitely doesn't feel as rewarding as other bursters, but you have to remember cc is effective throughout the entire game while damage can be mitigated. While I won't say she has invisible power she does have subtler strengths than someone like Orianna.
